about.title: The Company
about.p1: The {company} was born from a passion for stories told by the fireside, for puppets coming to life, and for the fascinating universe of the Middle Ages.
about.p2: Specializing in the adaptation of the {work}, the company offers lively, interactive, and musical shows, where the fox's cunning meets the wolf Ysengrin's foolishness.
about.p3: We travel the roads of France, from castles to festivals, to amaze young and old.
